Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Very surface level from AI - details how to be more clear in the points you make. University lecturer much better at responding to how your essay has responded to the question, the quality of research and quality of arguments. Teacher feedback much more useful in future assignments. AI good to make improvements on the spot

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: both provide elements of positive feedback which give me confidence in my writing

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Can trust the feedback from teachers more than AI
